Purpose: To measure the concentration of boron in serum or plasma specimens, ensuring accurate and reliable results.
Container: Serum Separator Tube (SST) for serum; lithium heparin (green top) or EDTA (lavender top) tubes without gel for plasma
Equipment: Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometer (ICP-MS), micropipettes, centrifuge, vortex mixer, analytical balance
